name: Haunted Girls
description:
We generally welcome both fanfiction and uploading videos of gameplay, with the exception of anything that violates public morals, any bullying or slander, or anything that detracts from the game experience. We give approval to upload gameplay videos of both the full version and the free demo version.
★Please do not upload videos of gameplay only, with no voice or text commentary from the player.
★When broadcasting or uploading a video, please include the game name in the video title and include the game webpage URL in the video details.
★Please only show 1 character's story in the video/broadcast (do not upload all 3 characters' stories).
★Please be aware that we may request any fanfiction or videos/broadcasts violating our terms be taken down.
developers: ひとりサークル「匙投げ部」
